alert.note: Alert for St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 10 at 9:14AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Tickfaw River Near Montpelier affecting St. Helena Parish. For the Tickfaw River...including Liverpool, Holden, Killian, Montpelier...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Tickfaw River Near Montpelier. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Forestry and sand and gravel operations will be curtailed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.6 feet Wednesday morning. - Action stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
